nodes.text: The 67e fusion core was a type of fusion generator manufactured by Klyd-Marro. These were used in the K-88 "Event Horizon" sublight engines commonly installed on RZ-2 A-wing interceptors. Cryogenic power tubes from the K-88 "Event Horizon" engines fueled the enormous 67e fusion cores that provided massive thrust to achieve high speeds for the RZ-2 A-wing.
